forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 50, with temperatures falling to around 44 in the afternoon. North wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 32. Northwest wind around 2 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon sun bathes Boston in gentle light, the air carries a crispness that heralds the autumn chill. The temperature, currently hovering near 50 degrees, will gradually lower, wrapping the city in a more pronounced coolness as the hours progress. A gentle north wind whispers through the trees, making the golden leaves rustle softly above. With no sign of fog or cloud, the sky stretches in a clear, vibrant blue, stretching endlessly above the cityscape.

Tonight, a calm serenity will settle over Boston as the temperature dips to about 32 degrees, inviting a stillness that accompanies the cool night air. For those venturing outdoors, layers will be your ally; a lightweight coat, perhaps a scarf, will add comfort against the evening chill. As city lights twinkle into view, consider a leisurely stroll along the riverbank or a cozy evening at a nearby café, where the warmth of conversation mingles with the aroma of freshly brewed coffee. The beauty of this crisp autumn day invites a quiet moment of reflection or a chance to embrace the simple pleasures of life in this picturesque setting.
